alert.note: Alert for Bennington (Vermont) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued December 18 at 12:13PM EST until December 19 at 9:40AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: && ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL LATE TOMORROW MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Hoosic River at Williamstown. * WHEN...Until late tomorrow morning. * IMPACTS...At 11.0 feet, most of Cole Field is inundated, as well as the portion of Stetson Road that runs along Cole Field. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM EST Monday the stage was 9.2 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 11.9 feet this evening. It will then fall below flood stage late tonight. - Flood stage is 9.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood && Hoosic River Williamstown Flood Stage: 9.0 Observed Stage at Mon 11 am: 9.2 Forecast: Mon 1 pm 11.0 Mon 7 pm 11.9 Tue 1 am 9.8 Tue 7 am 8.0 Tue 1 pm 7.5 Tue 7 pm 7.2 Wed 1 am 7.0 Wed 7 am 6.9 Wed 1 pm 6.7 Wed 7 pm 6.6 Thu 1 am 6.4 Thu 7 am 6.4 &&
